subject: Verify all task verification metadata
description:
Go through every task in this plan and run their verification commands to ensure they all pass.

2. Run the verification command
3. Compare output to expected result
4. Report any failures

This is the final quality gate before learnings collection.

learnings: All verifications passed: 29/29 tests, typecheck clean, lint clean.
